column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Friday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from January 6 to January 27, 2003.      The minutes are attached.Attachment (54 KB PDF)2003 Monetary policyHome |News and eventsAccessibility Last update: March 28, 2003
